g.text: Proposed refactoring (Version 2) of the multi-component Leader Election that was introduced in Apache Flink 1.15+ (FLINK-26522)
is used to replace the componentId
It is created and owned by the HighAvailabilityServices.
We could even make this a generic interface
is used to unregister the LeaderContender
